title: Firmware Risk Mitigation to Prevent Unplanned Control System Downtime
problem: Known controller firmware defects could intermittently disrupt controller-to-HMI communications, creating risk of unplanned production stops.
solution: Analyzed firmware behavior, identified high-risk revisions, and defined a controlled migration and mitigation strategy to eliminate failure modes.
benefit: Significantly reduced likelihood of unplanned downtime and stabilized critical control infrastructure.
